nodes.text: A Refuge Stinger was a species of creature that could be found in the Darkside sector of the planet Coruscant.

The stingers were both predators and scavengers, eating smaller creatures and edible rubbish. They made nests on top of piles of rubbish and would only attack people if their nests were disturbed. Their main method of attack was to glide down onto prey and then stun them with their short tendrils, which could cause electric shocks.
It is possible that the stingers' name was intended to be "Refuse Stinger", but was misspelt.
